verses.text: \w These|strong="H6965"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w last|strong="H6965"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*: “\w The|strong="H5002"\w* \w oracle|strong="H5002"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w*, \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w oracle|strong="H5002"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w* \w raised|strong="H6965"\w* \w on|strong="H6965"\w* \w high|strong="H5920"\w*, \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w one|strong="H1121"\w* \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w* \w by|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* God \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w sweet|strong="H5273"\w* \w psalmist|strong="H2158"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*:\f + \fr 23:1 \ft Or the hero of the songs of Israel or the favorite of the Strong One of Israel\f*

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w through|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*; \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1696"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w*.

\w The|strong="H1696"\w* \w God|strong="H6697"\w* \w of|strong="H6697"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w*; \w the|strong="H1696"\w* \w Rock|strong="H6697"\w* \w of|strong="H6697"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H1696"\w*, ‘\w He|strong="H3478"\w* \w who|strong="H3478"\w* \w rules|strong="H4910"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* \w people|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H1696"\w* justice, \w who|strong="H3478"\w* \w rules|strong="H4910"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* \w fear|strong="H3374"\w* \w of|strong="H6697"\w* \w God|strong="H6697"\w*,

\w is|strong="H8121"\w* \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w light|strong="H5051"\w* \w of|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w at|strong="H3808"\w* sunrise \w of|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* cloudless \w dawn|strong="H1242"\w*, \w the|strong="H3808"\w* glistening \w after|strong="H1242"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w rain|strong="H4306"\w* \w on|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* sprouting \w grass|strong="H1877"\w* \w of|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w earth|strong="H8121"\w*.’

\w Is|strong="H3651"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w right|strong="H3651"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*? \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* \w established|strong="H7760"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w me|strong="H7760"\w* \w an|strong="H7760"\w* \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*, \w ordered|strong="H6186"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w secured|strong="H8104"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* part. \w Will|strong="H1004"\w* \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w bring|strong="H7760"\w* \w about|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w full|strong="H3605"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w desire|strong="H2656"\w*?

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w worthless|strong="H1100"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w thorns|strong="H6975"\w* raked aside, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w can|strong="H3947"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w gathered|strong="H3588"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w The|strong="H4390"\w* man who \w touches|strong="H5060"\w* \w them|strong="H8313"\w* must \w be|strong="H6086"\w* \w armed|strong="H4390"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w iron|strong="H1270"\w* \w or|strong="H2595"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H4390"\w* \w shaft|strong="H6086"\w* \w of|strong="H4390"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w spear|strong="H2595"\w*. \w The|strong="H4390"\w* fire \w burns|strong="H8313"\w* \w them|strong="H8313"\w* \w to|strong="H5060"\w* ashes \w in|strong="H6086"\w* \w the|strong="H4390"\w* \w place|strong="H7675"\w* where they lie.” David’s Mighty Men (1 Chronicles 11:10–47)

\w These|strong="H1931"\w* \w are|strong="H1368"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w names|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*’s \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \w men|strong="H1368"\w*: Josheb-basshebeth the Tahchemonite \f + \fr 23:8 \ft Tahchemonite is probably a variant of Hachmonite; see 1 Chronicles 11:11.\f* was chief of the Three.\f + \fr 23:8 \ft Or chief among the captains\f* He wielded his spear against \f + \fr 23:8 \ft Some LXX manuscripts (see also 1 Chronicles 11:11); Hebrew He was called Adino the Eznite because of\f* eight hundred men, whom he killed at one time.

Next in command was Eleazar son of Dodo \f + \fr 23:9 \ft Dodo is a variant of Dodai; see 1 Chronicles 27:4.\f* the Ahohite. As one of the three mighty men, he went with David to taunt the Philistines who had gathered for battle at Pas-dammim. The men of Israel retreated,

but Eleazar stood his ground and struck the Philistines until his hand grew weary and stuck to his sword. The LORD brought about a great victory that day. Then the troops returned to him, but only to plunder the dead.
And after him was Shammah son of Agee the Hararite. When the Philistines had banded together near a field full of lentils, Israel’s troops fled from them.
But Shammah took his stand in the middle of the field, defended it, and struck down the Philistines. So the LORD brought about a great victory.

\w At|strong="H2583"\w* \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w* \w time|strong="H7105"\w*, \w three|strong="H7970"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* \w men|strong="H7218"\w* \w went|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w at|strong="H2583"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* \w cave|strong="H4631"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w Adullam|strong="H5725"\w*, while \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w company|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w was|strong="H1732"\w* \w encamped|strong="H2583"\w* \w in|strong="H2583"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* \w Valley|strong="H6010"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w Rephaim|strong="H7497"\w*.

\w At|strong="H1732"\w* \w that|strong="H1732"\w* time \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w was|strong="H1732"\w* \w in|strong="H1035"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* \w stronghold|strong="H4686"\w*, \w and|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* \w garrison|strong="H4673"\w* \w of|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w was|strong="H1732"\w* \w at|strong="H1732"\w* \w Bethlehem|strong="H1035"\w*.

\w David|strong="H1732"\w* longed \w for|strong="H4325"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w and|strong="H1732"\w* said, “\w Oh|strong="H4310"\w*, \w that|strong="H4325"\w* \w someone|strong="H4310"\w* \w would|strong="H4310"\w* get \w me|strong="H8248"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w drink|strong="H8248"\w* \w of|strong="H8179"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w from|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* well near \w the|strong="H1732"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H8179"\w* \w Bethlehem|strong="H1035"\w*!”

\w So|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \w men|strong="H1368"\w* \w broke|strong="H1234"\w* \w through|strong="H1234"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w Philistine|strong="H6430"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, \w drew|strong="H7579"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* well \w near|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Bethlehem|strong="H1035"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H5375"\w* \w it|strong="H5375"\w* back \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*. \w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w refused|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w it|strong="H5375"\w*; \w instead|strong="H3808"\w*, \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w poured|strong="H5258"\w* \w it|strong="H5375"\w* \w out|strong="H5258"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*,

saying, “\w Far|strong="H2486"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w from|strong="H5315"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w*! \w Is|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w men|strong="H1368"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* risked \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w lives|strong="H5315"\w*?” \w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w refused|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w*. \w Such|strong="H2063"\w* \w were|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* exploits \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \w men|strong="H1368"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H5921"\w* Abishai, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* brother \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zeruiah|strong="H6870"\w*, \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Three|strong="H7969"\w*,\f + \fr 23:18 \ft Most Hebrew manuscripts (see also 1 Chronicles 11:20); two Hebrew manuscripts and Syriac the Thirty\f* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w lifted|strong="H5782"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w spear|strong="H2595"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w*, \w killed|strong="H2491"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* won \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w along|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Three|strong="H7969"\w*.

\w Was|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H4480"\w* \w honored|strong="H3513"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Three|strong="H7969"\w*?\f + \fr 23:19 \ft Hebrew; Syriac the Thirty\f* \w And|strong="H8269"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w became|strong="H1961"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w commander|strong="H8269"\w*, \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w though|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w included|strong="H1961"\w* \w among|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Three|strong="H7969"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Benaiah|strong="H1141"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* valor \f + \fr 23:20 \ft Or Benaiah son of Jehoiada was the son of Ishhai\f* \w from|strong="H3381"\w* \w Kabzeel|strong="H6909"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w exploits|strong="H6467"\w*. \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* champions \f + \fr 23:20 \ft Or two sons of Ariel\f* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w snowy|strong="H7950"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w went|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w into|strong="H3381"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* pit \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w killed|strong="H5221"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* lion.

\w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w also|strong="H3027"\w* \w killed|strong="H2026"\w* \w an|strong="H5221"\w* \w Egyptian|strong="H4713"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* huge man. Although \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w Egyptian|strong="H4713"\w* \w had|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w spear|strong="H2595"\w* \w in|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H5221"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, Benaiah \w went|strong="H3381"\w* \w against|strong="H3027"\w* \w him|strong="H5221"\w* \w with|strong="H3381"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w club|strong="H7626"\w*, \w snatched|strong="H1497"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w spear|strong="H2595"\w* \w from|strong="H3381"\w* \w his|strong="H5221"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w killed|strong="H2026"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w Egyptian|strong="H4713"\w* \w with|strong="H3381"\w* \w his|strong="H5221"\w* \w own|strong="H3027"\w* \w spear|strong="H2595"\w*.

\w These|strong="H6213"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* exploits \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Benaiah|strong="H1141"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w*, \w who|strong="H1121"\w* won \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* alongside \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \w men|strong="H1368"\w*.

\w He|strong="H1732"\w* \w was|strong="H1732"\w* \w most|strong="H4480"\w* \w honored|strong="H3513"\w* \w among|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w Thirty|strong="H7970"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H1732"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* become \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w Three|strong="H7969"\w*. \w And|strong="H7970"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w appointed|strong="H7760"\w* \w him|strong="H7760"\w* \w over|strong="H4480"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w guard|strong="H4928"\w*.

Now these \w were|strong="H1121"\w* members \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3097"\w* \w Thirty|strong="H7970"\w*:\f + \fr 23:24 \ft Literally In the Thirty (were):\f* Asahel the brother of Joab, Elhanan son of Dodo of Bethlehem,
Shammah the Harodite, Elika the Harodite,
Helez the Paltite, Ira son of Ikkesh the Tekoite,
Abiezer the Anathothite, Mebunnai \f + \fr 23:27 \ft Hebrew; some LXX manuscripts Sibbecai; see 2 Samuel 21:18 and 1 Chronicles 11:29.\f* the Hushathite,
Zalmon the Ahohite, Maharai the Netophathite,

Heled \f + \fr 23:29 \ft Some Hebrew manuscripts and Vulgate (see also 1 Chronicles 11:30); most MT manuscripts Heleb\f* son of Baanah the Netophathite, Ittai \f + \fr 23:29 \ft Ittai is a variant of Ithai; see 1 Chronicles 11:31.\f* son of Ribai from Gibeah of the Benjamites,
Benaiah the Pirathonite, Hiddai \f + \fr 23:30 \ft Hiddai is a variant of Hurai; see 1 Chronicles 11:32.\f* from the brooks \f + \fr 23:30 \ft Or from the ravines\f* of Gaash,
Abi-albon the Arbathite, Azmaveth the Barhumite,
Eliahba the Shaalbonite, the sons of Jashen,\f + \fr 23:32 \ft Jashen is a variant of Hashem; see 1 Chronicles 11:34.\f* Jonathan

son of Shammah \f + \fr 23:33 \ft Some LXX manuscripts (see also 1 Chronicles 11:34); Hebrew Jonathan, 33 Shammah\f* the Hararite, Ahiam son of Sharar \f + \fr 23:33 \ft Hebrew; some LXX manuscripts Sachar; see 1 Chronicles 11:35.\f* the Hararite,
Eliphelet son of Ahasbai the Maacathite, Eliam son of Ahithophel the Gilonite,
Hezro the Carmelite, Paarai the Arbite,
Igal son of Nathan of Zobah, Bani the Gadite,
Zelek the Ammonite, Naharai the Beerothite, the armor-bearer of Joab son of Zeruiah,
Ira the Ithrite, Gareb the Ithrite,
and Uriah the Hittite. \w There|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H3605"\w* \w thirty-seven|strong="H7970"\w* \w in|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w*.
